solution_line_template: After losing {lost_legos} legos, Nellie has {initial_legos} - {lost_legos} = <<{initial_legos}-{lost_legos}={after_loss}>>{after_loss} legos.
After giving her sister {given_to_sister} legos Nellie has {after_loss} - {given_to_sister} = <<{after_loss}-{given_to_sister}={after_giving}>>{after_giving} legos
